For this tutorial, you should go through the examples in the following chapters of the R4DS textbook:

-   R4DS [Ch 5](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/data-tidy) on tidying data.
-   R4DS [Ch 19](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/joins) on joining data.

You can read them in any order you like.

These chapters cover functions and methods that you will need to complete Exercise 2 of Summative Assessment 1.
